code: import Scrollbar from'smooth-scrollbar';import{useEffect}from'react';var overscrollOptions={enable:true,effect:'bounce',damping:0.15,maxOverscroll:0,glowColor:'#fff'};var options={damping:0.07};var Scroll=function Scroll(){useEffect(function(){Scrollbar.init(document.body,options);return function(){if(Scrollbar)Scrollbar.destroy(document.body);};},[]);return null;};export default Scroll;
